Title: ArcGIS Silverlight Controls
Description: ArcGISSLControls is a set of ArcGIS Silverlight controls that is built on top of the ArcGIS Silverlight SDK, it is developed in C# programming language.
HomeWiki:
ArcGISSLControls is a set of ArcGIS Silverlight controls that is built on top of the ArcGIS Silverlight SDK, it is developed in C# programming language.

I've developed these controls as part of my everyday work on ArcGIS Silverlight SDK.

Controls include:
1- Mapping Toolbar
2- Drawing Toolbar
3- Measure Toolbar
4- Identify Results Panel
5- Table Of Contents

This project is based on my Silverlight Light controls.

This is a screenshot of these controls in action

Click here to see a sample.

I hope you find these controls useful.
